title: PrimeFaces with Jakarta EE 10 made simple
content: In this article we will discuss how to create and deploy a Jakarta EE 10 application that uses Primefaces as Jakarta Faces implementation. We will build a sample application that will run in microservice-style as WildFly Bootable JAR. PrimeFaces extends Jakarta Faces by providing a wide range of rich and customizable UI components that are ...  The post appeared first on .
